hero.description: Don’t feel sheepish reaching for that Gruyère. Cheese doesn’t deserve its unhealthy reputation.
hero.title: Cheese actually isn’t bad for you!

randomArticles.description: Players with disabilities and chronic illnesses haven't waited around for console manufacturers to look their way. Here's how far we've come—and how far we have to go.
randomArticles.title: Gamers Forge Their Own Paths When It Comes to Accessibility

randomArticles.description: Engineers hinted they had hidden a code in the parachute that landed the Perseverance rover. Within hours, puzzle enthusiasts cracked it.
randomArticles.title: NASA's Mars Parachute Had a Hidden Code. Meet the French Student Who Cracked It.

randomArticles.description: Mosha, the Asian elephant, received the first prosthetic limb made especially for her species.
randomArticles.title: Meet Mosha, the Elephant who Received a Prosthetic Leg after a Landmine Explosion

randomArticles.description: “At the heart of our mental chess game lies a profound lesson: The difference between being content or distraught is a matter of perspective.”
randomArticles.title: When The Prison Banned Board Games, We Played Chess In Our Minds

randomArticles.description: We asked three unique and lovely centenarians what their most valuable life lessons were, and also their regrets.
randomArticles.title: Life Lessons From 100-Year-Olds

animalCorner.title: This photograph takes outstanding pictures of your doggo

animalCorner.description: Everything you need now from your cat!
animalCorner.title: Please hug me
